articles.title: Turkey set to host COP31 as Australia steps aside - BBC
articles.description: Australia will now support the Turkish bid to host the climate talks in return for their minister chairing them.
articles.content:
The COP31 climate meeting is now expected to be held inTurkey after Australia dropped its bid to host the annual event.
Under the UN rules, the right to host the COP in 2026 falls to a group of coun… [+3515 chars]
